description: Detects the usage of the "net.exe" command to start a service using the "start" flag
author: Timur Zinniatullin
Daniil Yugoslavskiy
oscd.community
false_positives: Legitimate administrator or user executes a service for legitimate reasons.
name: Start Windows Service Via Net.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:("*\\net.exe" OR "*\\net1.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("net.exe" OR "net1.exe"))) AND process.command_line.text:"*\ start\ *")
